Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit (Ver4)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FDA-cleared in vitro diagnostic real-time PCR instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit (Ver4) for detection and subtyping of human influenza A viruses.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for determination of the subtype of seasonal human influenza A viruses as A(H3) and/or A(H1)pdm09 from viral RNA in respiratory specimens and viral cultures, and to provide epidemiologic information for influenza surveillance.
